name: onok
label: { Function }
desc: Gets or sets a callback function to be invoked when the user clicks 'Ok' button or closes the dialog.
script: alertify.alert('a callback will be invoked on ok.').set('onok', function(closeEvent){ alertify.success('Ok');} );
remark: To prevent the dialog from closing, either set closeEvent.cancel = true or make your callback return false .

name: invokeOnCloseOff
label: {Boolean}
desc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether closing the dialog via Close button or Dimmer should look for and trigger the action of a button having invokeOnClose set to true. Useful when you want to differentiate between closing the dialog or clicking an action that closes it.
